import axios from "axios";
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react";

const cards = [
  {
    id: 70,

    categoria_id: null,
    cardTitle: "Loli",
    cardMeaning: "Master",
    cardSound:
      "",
    cardImage: "media/cards/temp_kexlp3",
    imageURL: "",
  },
  {
    id: 37,
    owner_id: null,
    categoria_id: 3,
    cardTitle: "Book",
    cardMeaning: "Libro",
    cardSound: null,
    cardImage: "",
    imageURL: "https://cf.shopee.co.th/file/e80487080979a830a4a766cfe40e3fb1",
  },
  {
    id: 29,
    owner_id: null,
    categoria_id: 1,
    cardTitle: "Lion",
    cardMeaning: "Le√≥n",
    cardSound: null,
    cardImage: "",
    imageURL:
      "https://www.bioparcvalencia.es/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/ficha-animal-bioparc-valencia-leon.jpg",
  },
  {
    id: 31,
    owner_id: null,
    categoria_id: 1,
    cardTitle: "Wolf",
    cardMeaning: "Lobo",
    cardSound:
      "",
    cardImage: "",
    imageURL:
      "https://t2.ev.ltmcdn.com/es/posts/5/1/6/por_que_esta_en_peligro_de_extincion_el_lobo_gris_mexicano_2615_600_square.jpg",
  },
  {
    id: 30,
    owner_id: null,
    categoria_id: 1,
    cardTitle: "Cow",
    cardMeaning: "Vaca",
    cardSound:
      "",
    cardImage: "",
    imageURL: "https://definicion.de/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/ganado.jpg",
  },
  {
    id: 47,
    owner_id: 1,
    categoria_id: null,
    cardTitle: "Yikes",
    cardMeaning: "que Horror, oh no",
    cardSound: null,
    cardImage: "",
    imageURL:
      "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/93/ef/4c/93ef4ce99b130f6ef30796172d4ea48c.png",
  },
  {
    id: 56,
    owner_id: 1,
    categoria_id: null,
    cardTitle: "Disappoint",
    cardMeaning: "Decepcionar",
    cardSound:
      "",
    cardImage: "",
    imageURL:
      "https://png.pngtree.com/png-clipart/20190630/original/pngtree-vector-disappointed-emoji-icon-png-image_4123699.jpg",
  },
  {
    id: 26,
    owner_id: null,
    categoria_id: 1,
    cardTitle: "Dog",
    cardMeaning: "Perro",
    cardSound:
      "",
    cardImage: "",
    imageURL:
      "https://www.redaccionmedica.com/images/destacados/coronavirus-perros-no-necesitan-mascarillas-porque-no-se-contagian--5615.jpg",
  },
  {
    id: 55,
    owner_id: null,
    categoria_id: 1,
    cardTitle: "Goose",
    cardMeaning: "Ganso",
    cardSound: null,
    cardImage: "",
    imageURL:
      "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/39/Domestic_Goose.jpg/1200px-Domestic_Goose.jpg",
  },
  {
    id: 39,
    owner_id: null,
    categoria_id: 3,
    cardTitle: "Coffee",
    cardMeaning: "Cafe",
    cardSound:
      "",
    cardImage: "",
    imageURL:
      "https://media.istockphoto.com/id/1286808993/es/foto/caf%C3%A9-negro-aislado-sobre-un-fondo-blanco.jpg?s=612x612&w=0&k=20&c=mSa5t9pFd_YzOW4dEFh-hQ7JOHWuMwhHqtHGy8hTiAc=",
  },
  {
    id: 54,
    owner_id: 1,
    categoria_id: null,
    cardTitle: "Grant",
    cardMeaning: "Conceder",
    cardSound:
      "",
    cardImage: "",
    imageURL:
      "https://thumbs.dreamstime.com/b/vector-access-granted-grunge-stamp-seal-tick-inside-green-label-surface-round-rubber-imprint-scratched-139450395.jpg",
  },
  {
    id: 25,
    owner_id: 1,
    categoria_id: null,
    cardTitle: "Moreover",
    cardMeaning: "Adem√°s",
    cardSound: null,
    cardImage: "",
    imageURL:
      "https://t1.uc.ltmcdn.com/es/posts/5/4/3/cuales_son_las_funciones_del_lenguaje_24345_orig.jpg",
  },
  {
    id: 58,
    owner_id: 1,
    categoria_id: null,
    cardTitle: "Ricochet",
    cardMeaning: "Rebotar",
    cardSound: null,
    cardImage: "media/cards/temp_edf5hr",
    imageURL: "",
  },
  {
    id: 34,
    owner_id: null,
    categoria_id: 2,
    cardTitle: "Camera",
    cardMeaning: "Camara",
    cardSound: null,
    cardImage: "",
    imageURL:
      "https://www.sony.com.mx/image/a9bd3d4cc0dac35199d6d92078bfe331?fmt=pjpeg&bgcolor=FFFFFF&bgc=FFFFFF&wid=2515&hei=1320",
  },
  {
    id: 35,
    owner_id: null,
    categoria_id: 2,
    cardTitle: "Computer",
    cardMeaning: "Computadora",
    cardSound: null,
    cardImage: "",
    imageURL:
      "https://ptc-computer.com.kh/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/Size-For-Web-42-300x300.jpg",
  },
  {
    id: 50,
    owner_id: 84,
    categoria_id: null,
    cardTitle: "Bald",
    cardMeaning: "Calvo",
    cardSound: null,
    cardImage: "",
    imageURL:
      "https://elmanana.com.mx/u/fotografias/m/2022/5/16/f608x342-92237_121960_3.jpg",
  },
  {
    id: 52,
    owner_id: 84,
    categoria_id: null,
    cardTitle: "Weed",
    cardMeaning: "Hierba ",
    cardSound: null,
    cardImage: "media/cards/temp_q5htpo",
    imageURL: "",
  },
  {
    id: 57,
    owner_id: 1,
    categoria_id: null,
    cardTitle: "Miracle",
    cardMeaning: "Milagro",
    cardSound: null,
    cardImage: "media/cards/temp_llh76h",
    imageURL: "",
  },
  {
    id: 40,
    owner_id: 1,
    categoria_id: null,
    cardTitle: "Hold on",
    cardMeaning: "Esperar",
    cardSound:
      "",
    cardImage: "media/cards/temp_a5w1ey",
    imageURL: "",
  },
  {
    id: 67,
    owner_id: 1,
    categoria_id: null,
    cardTitle: "both",
    cardMeaning: "Ambis",
    cardSound:
      "",
    cardImage: "",
    imageURL:
      "https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/dua-lipa-attends-the-capital-jingle-bell-ball-2022-at-the-news-photo-1672660281.jpg",
  },
];
const urlImageCard = "https://res.cloudinary.com/tolumaster/image/upload/v1/";

const Quiz = () => {
  const [radioActive, setRadioActive] = useState();
  const [cardPicked, setCardPicked] = useState();
  const [answers, setAnswers] = useState();
  const [correct, setCorrect] = useState(false);
  const [isSent, setIsSent] = useState(false);
  const [cont, setCont] = useState(1);

  const handleRadio = (number) => {
    setRadioActive(number);
    if (number === cardPicked.id) {
      setCorrect(true);
      setIsSent(true);
      console.log("correct number");
    } else {
      setCorrect(false);
      setIsSent(true);
      console.log("incorrect number");
    }
  };

  const generateQuestion = () => {
    isSent && setCont(cont + 1);
    setIsSent(false);
    setRadioActive(-1);
    const arr = cards,
      shuffled = arr.sort(() => 0.5 - Math.random()),
      randomValues = shuffled.slice(0, 3);
    setAnswers(randomValues);
    const randomIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * randomValues.length);
    setCardPicked(randomValues[randomIndex]);
  };
  useEffect(() => {
    generateQuestion();
  }, []);

  return (
    <>
      <div className="">
        <div className="w-full max-w-md mx-auto">
          <h1 className="text-4xl font-bold mb-4">Quiz sobre </h1>
          <form>
            <div className="bg-slate-800 shadow-md rounded px-8 pt-6 pb-8 mb-4">
              <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold mb-4">Pregunta {cont}</h2>
              <p className="mb-8 text-xl">
                ¬øCu√°l es el significado de{" "}
                <span className="font-bold">
                  {cardPicked && cardPicked.cardTitle}
                </span>
                ?
              </p>
              {/* <div
                className="bg-contain m-2 bg-no-repeat bg-center  mx-auto w-4/6 h-48 "
                style={
                  cardPicked && {
                    borderColor: "white",
                    backgroundImage:
                      "url(" +
                      (cardPicked.imageURL === ""
                        ? urlImageCard + cardPicked.cardImage
                        : cardPicked.imageURL) +
                      ")",
                  }
                }
              ></div> */}
              {answers &&
                answers.map((answer, key) => {
                  return (
                    <div
                      key={answer.id}
                      onClick={() => handleRadio(answer.id)}
                      className={`mb-4 font-bold ${
                        isSent
                          ? correct
                            ? answer.id === cardPicked.id
                              ? "bg-emerald-800"
                              : "bg-gray-900"
                            : answer.id === cardPicked.id
                            ? "bg-emerald-800"
                            : radioActive === answer.id
                            ? "bg-red-800"
                            : "bg-gray-900"
                          : "bg-gray-900"
                      }  h-12 flex  rounded-md`}
                    >
                      <label className="inline-flex items-center">
                        <input
                          readOnly
                          type="radio"
                          name="q1"
                          value="b"
                          checked={radioActive === answer.id ? true : false}
                          className="radio radio-success h-5 w-5 ml-2 text-blue-600"
                        />
                        <span className="ml-4 text-gray-200">
                          {answer.cardMeaning}
                        </span>
                      </label>
                    </div>
                  );
                })}
              <div className="flex items-center justify-evenly">
                <div className="btn btn-success" onClick={generateQuestion}>
                  Siguiente
                </div>

                {isSent ? (
                  correct ? (
                    <div className="alert alert-success shadow-lg w-1/2">
                      <div>
                        <svg
                          xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                          className="stroke-current flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6"
                          fill="none"
                          viewBox="0 0 24 24"
                        >
                          <path
                            strokeLinecap="round"
                            strokeLinejoin="round"
                            strokeWidth="2"
                            d="M9 12l2 2 4-4m6 2a9 9 0 11-18 0 9 9 0 0118 0z"
                          />
                        </svg>
                        <span>Correcto!</span>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  ) : (
                    <div className="alert alert-error shadow-lg w-1/2">
                      <div>
                        <svg
                          xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                          className="stroke-current flex-shrink-0 h-6 w-6"
                          fill="none"
                          viewBox="0 0 24 24"
                        >
                          <path
                            strokeLinecap="round"
                            strokeLinejoin="round"
                            strokeWidth="2"
                            d="M10 14l2-2m0 0l2-2m-2 2l-2-2m2 2l2 2m7-2a9 9 0 11-18 0 9 9 0 0118 0z"
                          />
                        </svg>
                        <span>Incorrecto</span>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  )
                ) : (
                  <div className="w-1/2"></div>
                )}
              </div>
            </div>
          </form>
        </div>
      </div>
    </>
  );
};

export default Quiz;
